page.title: 04Child's Life In Ormesby.
page.content: On week-days in {Ormesby}I go to { {Ormesby Primary School.}It starts at 8.55am and finishes 3.30pm.I like the school and have alot of friends there. When I get home I have my tea then play out.We play tennis,skips,football and I play table-tennis.In our road there is quite alot of children.At the end of our road there is a shop lots of people in our estate use the shop it sells papers,sweets,cards and lots of other things.There is also a park it is used by alot of people including dogs.At the week-end we go out for a run in the car when we get back we go for a walk on the hills.Some people in {Ormesby}are bossy and don't like kids and shout at them.In{Ormesby} there are not many facilities.
